txt.en: 'Are you ready to leave, [placeholder]? I share Lord Celeborn's concerns; let us discuss them as we walk.'
Instance: The Worries of Lord Celeborn
'You must continue to be our eyes and ears, [placeholder].'
'To that end, I give to you a gift: a cloak of Elf-make.'
You have been summoned to an audience with Lord Celeborn of L처rien, and should speak now to Haldir.
'Few indeed have been given such garments. May it serve you well on the road ahead, wherever it may lie.'
Celeborn has called you to an audience in Caras Galadhon.
'I thank you for the deeds you have already done, and also for those you will surely do in the future.'
Haldir is waiting to speak with you about the worries of Lord Celeborn.
'Haldir will show you out, [placeholder].'
'This way, [placeholder].'
Talk to Haldir
Listen to what Celeborn has to say to you
Talk to Haldir
'Thank you, Haldir.'
'You have surprised me, [placeholder].'
'Not only did you defeat Grawulun the Caerog and diminish its corrupting influence in Buzun-gh창r...'
'...but you also managed to broker a peace of sorts between Elves and dwarves forced to stand together.'
'That may seem a lesser matter when measured against such a creature as Grawulun...'
'...but do not mistake it. Friendship between Elf and dwarf may count for much in the days ahead.'
You have been called to speak with Celeborn of L처rien following the defeat of Mazog.
'But I do not agree with one action you have taken, [placeholder].'
'Mazog is an enemy, and a foul one. His life should not have been spared.'
'He cannot stay here.'
'You cannot see it from here, [placeholder], but far to the east...'
'... a great cloud lies always over Dol Guldur, in Southern Mirkwood.'
'An evil stirs there, and it lies in watchfulness.'
'It does not have the strength to move against us, unless Sauron himself wages war upon L처rien.'
'But its power is growing. We cannot wait for the force in Dol Guldur to come forth in strength.'
'Lord Celeborn is waiting, [placeholder]. Come with me, for he greatly desires to speak with you.'
